title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain pasta, mix quickly with egg mixture and pancetta.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and tikka masala paste.
Cook onions until golden, then add tomato puree.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Simple yet delicious toast topped with fresh avocado, lemon juice, and chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden.
Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Sprinkle chili flakes on top and serve.
